name: Your Slaughter
description:
This game has:

  • visible blood
  • implied animal cruelty

Be warned.

In this ~2min game I tried to explore the way we as humans try to distance ourselves from the act of ending the lives of cattle, and how automatic and mindless this killing becomes when we stop thinking about what we are actually doing.

Submission for the ZaviiNet 1 Week GameJam 2021

4h development time

All assets used are CC0.
